review: We have a Roku on one TV, and bought this for our second TV.The Fire TV Stick was very easy to set up and works flawlessly. We are able to watch Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime which makes cable TV obsolete for us!There are only two minor complaints. One is that I didn't know it needed it's own power supply and in an old house plug-ins are at a premium. So taking up space for this is a little irritating. The second is that I feel the interface is not as intuitive as the Roku.Overall, neither is a big deal, and the Fire Stick is worth the price.
